DataElement.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Past Week Sexuality Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated observation of how much in the past week hot flashes have interfered with their sexuality, using a Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Past Week Sexuality Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale._The most recent week, including today._The feeling an individual has about their own sexual preferences and how those views are acted upon._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Hot Flash Related Daily Interference Scale
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A tool designed to measure the impact of hot flashes on overall quality of life as well as nine specific activities using a 10 point Likert scale.

The feeling an individual has about their own sexual preferences and how those views are acted upon.
